channel.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
channel.description:
Title says it all. Let's see who has the coolest scar (look wise) and who has the best story behind it. I'll start.
My coolest lookin scar is a 5 inch one on my chest. I had an inverted sternum (medically known as Pectus Excavatum), and had surgery a few years ago where they put a bar in my chest, and then popped out the "dent". I had the Bar in for a year, and was incapable of walking for 3 months after the surgery. It's funny though because when people at the pool ask me about it I tell them when I was little I was watching TV with my drunk dad and I changed the channel to Teletubbies and then he knifed me, took the remote and said "Sports center bitch". Rofl.
My other good one is when I was in 4th grade playing soccer on our elementary school's playground and somebody kicked the ball over the nearby fence, so I volunteered to hop it and grab the ball. While I was jumpin over I snagged my ass cheek on a nail sticking up and it ripped like a 4 inch scar down my right cheek haha. I ended up getting stitches. But the best part is later that night I was showering and you know those soap holders that stick out of the wall? Well ours was broken at the time so there was a jagged edge sticking out and I turned funny when I slipped a little and cut my other butt cheek and had to get stitches for that haha.
oh yeah and winner gets a cookie

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @WoodcutGuy WoodcutGuy
item.description:
@WoodcutGuy wrote:

I have a huge scar on my back from when I was snowboarding.

Dont go drunk snowboarding in the woods^^

You might get clipped by a tree

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Master1 RSPS Master
item.description:
@RSPS_Master1 wrote:

Preschool can fuck you up. 2 5th graders were playing tag while I was walking in front of them. One of them came by and passed me but the other one pushed me. I fell back and slammed my head on a cinder block.
My screams were so loud my mom (who was working there) and the principal heard them from in the school. They took me to the hospital. I had about 5 staples. After 3 weeks, my mom had to take the staples out her self. OUCH! Now I have a giant line the doesnt have any hair.

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote="`Lewk_, post:81, topic:300848"]I have a huge scar from my ass to my Achilles Tendon.
I was riding my dads motorcycle (I was 11) without him knowing, I went really fast, spun out of control, and I slide off, something caught on my lower ass and tore down to my Achilles Tendon. It bled ALOT.
Damn, I’ll never touch that shit again >.>[/quote]

Yeah if this were FML.com I would have to hit the “You deserved that one” button

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

[quote=“im hard, post:77, topic:300848”]

Voldemort killed my parents and put a scar on my head
Now im out to hunt him down and slay him.[/quote]Not funny man.

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:78, topic:300848”][quote author=im hard link=topic=397135.msg2955662#msg2955662 date=1252812161]

Voldemort killed my parents and put a scar on my head
Now im out to hunt him down and slay him.
[/quote]
Gtfo.

Anyways, I got a bullet wound on my side from getting shot from a couple of gangbangers after I threw their sign down because I was a rival of theirs n when they were reaching in their pockets I made a run for it. I was all of a sudden in alot of pain realizin I was shot and i fell n smacked my face hard on the concrete. Luckily, there were witnesses around and when I went down, they ran from being scared while the cops got them and were charged with attempted murder and other various charges. I was in the hospital for a week due to internal bleeding causing a bad loss of blood and infection to my intestine spreading. Was very close at hitting my spine that would of paralyzed me for my life. From then on, I stopped gangbanging yet still continue to represent my own blood.

Shows that you shouldn’t be messing around in the streets.[/quote]

Just because my scar is better then yours -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

I have a huge scar from my ass to my Achilles Tendon.
I was riding my dads motorcycle (I was 11) without him knowing, I went really fast, spun out of control, and I slide off, something caught on my lower ass and tore down to my Achilles Tendon. It bled ALOT.
Damn, I’ll never touch that shit again >.>

Read full topic

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

When I was about 5, me and my sister were playing on a trailer in my garage, climbing up and down. When I was climbing up I used the back light as like a step, when I put the pressure down on the light it fell off and my leg slit open on a wire sticking out. When I was 9 on the same trailer, I was at the top and the lights were out in my garage. I jumped down and felt the same wire slice open my leg. They turned the lights on and I looked down at it and thought “It’s not so bad” Then the blood started poring out of it. To this day I have 2 huge scars on the front and back of my left leg.

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

This is NOT me.

[quote=“maniown, post:1, topic:301725”]Well guys, the next few weeks of my life are going to suck. I had my entire weekend planned out. Football game and party tonight, and go to my friends lake house for the weekend. Not anymore.
So pretty much what happened is i was racing my friend on our dirtbikes and i took a corner to fast, i went through a barbwire fence and nearly decapitated myself. I just got out of the emergency room after being in there for a good 4 hours.
Long story short, i was 1.5 millimeters from killing myself. [/quote]

Do I get a cookie? (Even though it is not my story)

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

I was racing my brother to the car, i slipped over, broke my wrist and then had a peace of rock into my left leg, just under the knee cap! I had to have the rock removed (without any painkillers or something to numb my leg!!) I showed the FRENCH doctor by kicking him in the head when he was removing it, god that was painful

Ive still got the scar 7 years later, still shows A LOT!!

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?

item.title: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I have a scar on my left wrist. I got it while camping with my family last summer. We were cooking hot dogs around the campfire with these: And all was good. My bro, a complete retard and clumsy baboon, was taking his hot dog off and when he was done put it down right next to me. Note: The metal part is red hot. Now i reach down to get my drink… and miss. But guess what I did get? The metal part of the stick. I had a mark like a “U” for about 2 days, then all but one side (like a “/”) remained. Its been over a year. Its not exactly a “scar” but its a darker spot on my skin, like a permanent burn.

Read full topic
item.source: Who has the coolest scar and the best story with it?
